title: The spectrum of defect ABJM theory
authors: Charlotte Kristjansen, Xin Qian and Chenliang Su
abstract:
We determine the spectrum of quantum fluctuations in a 1/2-BPS domain wall
version of ABJM theory, thereby enabling the perturbative exploration of the
corresponding defect CFT. As expected, the spectrum reflects the supersymmetry
of the model.
